page.title: 10CLUBS IN GULVAL & MARAZION
page.content:
Lanisley Village Hall at Gulval Churchtown is the weekly meeting place for Girl Guides, Cubs and Brownies. The Womens' Institute and Gulval Community Association hold meetings and functions there. The recently formed playgroup use it on two mornings each week. Sunday School is held there each Sunday morning.
The Long Rock Wives Club, produce an annual entertainment in the Hall, which is also the venue for the West Cornwall Motor Club.
Marazion has a Working Men's Club, the Code Institute, where snooker is played, and a church hall used by the Womens' Institute and Wives Club.
